summary: MTOH Plug-in, u will need MTOH version 2.0 to work with, have fun
descriptionHtml:
My Type of Hair plug-in, this is but  a Esp Plug-in for my \'My Type of Hair\' mod( a hair pack)
U will need MTOH version 2.0 to work with,here is the link: 

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6173&tab=4&navtag=/downloads/file/discussions.php%3fid=6173 .

how to use it:
download MTOH v2.0, and this, put drop them into the folder, click on skyrimlauncher- data file- MOTH.esp, done

 have fun.
author: Meister crashs on the floor
